website_summaries.verdict: Boasting a modern look with a comfy feel, these sporty sandals are a great everyday option.
pros: Well cushioned and comfortable enough for day-to-day wear around the house, yet stylish enough to wear when out and about
Adjustable upper strap offers a personalized fit
A water resistant sole and quick drying footbed make these sandals suitable for poolside use, and inhibit the growth of odor causing bacteria
cons: While undeniably comfortable, the thick soles can take some getting used to

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am a size 10 in women's/8 in men's. After reading the reviews that mentioned these run small I decided to order a size 9. They fit perfectly. Love the adjustable strap (I have wide feet). Always loved this design of Adidas slides. So happy they make these without those little prongs on them. These are extremely "walking on a cloud," like. Very happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: TriSaraht0ps

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly comfortable, impossible to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable and convenient for slipping on and off throughout the day to go back and forth between inside and outside. The problem is that they are impossible to clean because the rim around the outside of the sandals has a groove that lets in water and debri. In my case, tent camping in the jungle, this led to the sandals acquiring mold beneath the footbed, and there being no way to clean them. Even soaking and high pressured spraying could not clean beneath the footbed. This I consider to be a design flaw. Very sturdy and comfortable for while they lasted though (3 months).
customer_reviews.author: Adrenaline

customer_reviews.title: Style, Comfort, Quality, & Price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these Adidas Performance mens originally for my son, and ironically, he received them the day before Father's Day When my husband saw them he liked them so much he was thrilled to gift them to him for Father's Day even though he was liking them a lot, as well. So, I had to order another pair because I felt bad and they both said they are very comfortable and like the way they look. The quick S&H is greatly appreciated! Much thanks for the great customer service, as well!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy P.

customer_reviews.title: They look and feel very cheap
customer_reviews.text: I had adidas sandals before and they last a lot and feel great. This in the other hand don't fit as expected. They look like a flat cut of cheap foam and feel just like that too. They're very unconftable, specially the top part. I'm a size 11 anf the size 12 looks like and feel like a size 10. I wanted to return them the moment I saw them but with my scheduled it's not worth the trip to ups. I'll stay away from this seller instead. You should do the same.
customer_reviews.author: Ram DA

customer_reviews.title: Interesting...
customer_reviews.text: Thought I'd try the "slides". Eh...they're okay. I like them. Can't wait to go full redneck and wear them with black shorts and white crew socks to Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Purple Polka Dot

customer_reviews.title: Very clean and effective design for its price
customer_reviews.text: There is plenty of padding; seems like sturdy binding between sole and base, glue won't fail easily. Durable connection of straps to the base too. Very good support for heels while squatting, grandeur of the classic fashionable white tri-stripe of Adidas brand is clearly observed from all angles. Can wear to grocery store, wear to job interview, wear to meet president, wear to the gym, wear to the beach, wear to meet friends, wear to space mission, wear to dates, wear to rock climbing, wear to fight club, wear to North Pole expedition; sandal is infinitesimally multifunctional and is guaranteed to impress at any occasion. Also effective tool for home defense.
customer_reviews.author: Jacko

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and stylish.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable slides. The adjustable strap works well and even held nicely trodding through sand and water. These also dried very quickly, although they have that weird slimy feel when wet. But most sandals do. My foot is a bit narrow and these fit great. I wear a size 9 shoe but ordered a size 8 because of the narrow foot issue. I think a 9 would have been perfect but the 8 fits just fine, my toes do go almost right to the edge though. If you have a wider foot or are a larger person in general I would probably order 1 size up. Otherwise if your foot is average just order size acurate.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M

customer_reviews.title: Held up pretty well
customer_reviews.text: I have never had sports sandals always just leather ones but these are very comfortable and I like the Velcro feature to adjust to your feet. So when I broke my foot and it was swollen I could readjust it to be looser so it dint bother my foot. I've had them for almost a year now and the white stripes across the top have begun to crack and the color won't clean white too well either even though I usually only wear them at home and a week after I got them the words on one of the sandals where it says cloudfoam and the Adidas logo on the heel disappeared but other than that they're great.
customer_reviews.author: Chato92

customer_reviews.title: buyer beware. Very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing adidas sandals for a while. This is my first pair with the foam foot pad and I hate these... Very uncomfortable to walk in. My feet slide all over the place. I've already worn them and threw away the box and wish I could return them...
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: My go-to sandal ... really, my primary footwear around the house
customer_reviews.text: My go-to sandal. The footbed is perfect. Non absorbent material, which does not hold foot odor. Not too soft, so The entire sandal can get wet (which I do often when washing the car, etc.) with no ill effect. The Velcro closure is industrial strength and isneasy to adjust. Once set, the Velcro doesn’t “give” at all. The molded bottom has a “grippy” pattern which is fairly non-skid. There are really no flaws in the design or production whatsoever. Just a bit pricey for a “plastic” sandal. The perfect alternative to anything sold by leftist, virtue-signaling, NIKE.
customer_reviews.author: Fountain-head

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking, these aren't the ones you want unless you have narrow feet and size up 2 sizes (or more)
customer_reviews.text: Really narrow. This is not for men or is grossly mislabeled in terms of size. I wear a size 43 Ecco shoe (which is like a 9/9.5 US size shoe. I bought a size 10 here and my heel was just about falling off/on the edge of the sandal, and my toes were right up to the edge of the front of this sandal and overhanging a bit on the edges. Yeah, no thanks...
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Locke

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly but needs a broader strap
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my husband, he usually wears a size 11. we ignored some of the reviews that said we should get one size bigger and ordered the same size and they fit perfectly. They are comfortable to wear, but the strap should have been broader. Gets difficult to walk fast in these. Otherwise a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: HBG

customer_reviews.title: Came apart after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my son, as we both wear Adidas sandal slides. Previous ones have lasted well-- like over year(s). This pair was a gift -- son wore them approximately a month, purchased 9/20/18. He was given as gift when home for Thanksgiving - Nov 22nd. Approx 1 month wear is a bit expensive. Reached out to RunWalk -- they seem to want to give me the run-around about replacing them. Good practice would want to fix this issue, as it was already stated that we have been purchasing this same shoe for 3+ years. Buyer Beware.
customer_reviews.author: txcountrydancer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable foot bed and great looking too
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable foot bed and great looking too. I researched multiple types of sandals (looking for the classic slip on) but didn't find much in my size (14). These have an amazing foot bed and adjustable Velcro top that customizes to each person. Buy and try, return if they don't work but I bet you'll keep them since they are awesome. Pros - Comfortable - Affordable - Stylish - Adjustable (Velcro) Cons - Can get a little warm - Slight cracking on top where white stripes are About Me – Male, 31yrs old, Married (6yrs), two dogs, no kids (yet), own home, live in GA, work in Manufacturing
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: These slide shoes should be good, but the strap is located much too far ...
customer_reviews.text: These slide shoes should be good, but the strap is located much too far forward. I bought a larger size than needed (11 vs. 10) to have some extra room all around. Even with the strap uncomfortably tight my toes were hanging off the front end with an inch of extra space behind the heel. Just so you don't think I have strange feet, two other styles of size 11 slides fit me normally, including an older Adidas no longer available.
customer_reviews.author: EB-58

customer_reviews.title: Sandals slide outward from feet.
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't take more than a dozen steps without the rear part of the sandals sliding outward from my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Carroll

customer_reviews.title: not worth it. super uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Honestly.... these are the most uncomfortable sandals I've ever worn in my life. I've gotten cheaper slides that are more comfortable than these. Adidas has always been a brand that disappoints me. They sell items a bit expensive and not comfortable at all. i once even bought some $70 shoes and my vans were a lot better. If your looking for something good around the same price range as this, go for under armour or nike.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M.

customer_reviews.title: Finally a shower shoe that fits
customer_reviews.text: I have lympodema in my lower leg/foot. I purchased these with the hope that they would aleviate my slipping in the shower. I put the shoes on, comfortable and lightweight. I step into the shower, initially they perform like rockstars. However, the shoes, after 10 minutes or so, seemed to become shoggy and floaty. I began to slip easily, the shoes were now slipping on my feet, making me unstable. I examined the shoes after i got out of the shower, they could have been tighter. After correcting the tightness issue the shoes hage pergormed fantastically. Lo
customer_reviews.author: The Carfanman

customer_reviews.title: Best Slide on the Market; Worst Availability
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing these slides for several years and they've worn out, but they are horribly hard to find and confusing to order. They are sized as women's. Every store I found these in have the tiny prongs in the sole instead of the cloud form cushion dents. These are THE best out there and Adidas needs to make them more available. They are perfect for people with painful feet who can't walk barefoot and they are highly durable. My first pair is still in decent shape and they're 3 or 4 years old, but are starting to lose the cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Eric & Jodie

customer_reviews.title: Good Sandals. For me, they ran true to size.
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews that said these run small, I sized up 1 size. For me, it didn't work out, they are too big. I'm going to return them and get a smaller size. The heels of my feet didn't stay in the middle of the shoes when I test walked them in the house. I got these sandals to wear in the shower and locker room at my gym. I don't want to take a chance on any slips in the wet areas if my heel slides off the shoe. On the plus side, the foot bed is very comfortable and the strap is adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Ace Edwards

customer_reviews.title: I would save your money and buy something better.
customer_reviews.text: I believe that I may have purchased a "knock-off". I owned a pair of these for 4-5 years with no problems. This pair literally started falling apart after only a week or so. I wear these shoes for a few hours each day before I go to work, so they don't see any kind of heavy use. Heck, they are just slip-ons. The shoe's upper is held to the sole with glue that has failed. The last pair was stitched onto the sole. I would save your money and buy something better.
customer_reviews.author: Eric P

customer_reviews.title: I don't know why it took a lot longer than usual to get used to them but now they are fine.
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I wear this type of sandals. Initially, they were uncomfortable and hurt somewhat when I wear them for longer than 10 minutes. Also, I would have some balance issues while wearing them and sometimes the heel would slide off the sandals. I was going to return them but then I thought may be I need to get used to them. I gave them more time and now they are ok. I don't know why it took a lot longer than usual to get used to them but now they are fine.
customer_reviews.author: Nq

customer_reviews.title: Wore down and hurt my feet
customer_reviews.text: I wore these as house slippers. After about 6 months, the heals wore down, and my left heal began to hurt. I believe these sandals caused a bone spike in my left heal. I am slightly over weight, but not that much. The worn heals,apparently caused too much weight on the heal of my foot. After another 6 months not wearing them, the pain is still there. If you buy these, I would recommend wearing them only for limited use, perhaps around a pool or in the shower. For extended use, be careful and buy shoes that offer support, cushioning and won't wear down.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: This is a very comfortable shoe. I am female with wide feet and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfortable shoe. I am female with wide feet and I find these to be far more comfortable than shoes designed for women. I've had several pair of Adidas slip-on shoes to wear around my house and I love them. They give me the cushion I need to walk on ceramic tile all day at home.
customer_reviews.author: K wells

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if these are water resistant
customer_reviews.text: Both my boyfriend and my slippers started to smell really bad like a wet towel not being dried for months kind of moldy smell. I don't think it's really water resistant because even hours after shower you can feel your feet squeezing some water out from the slippers while wearing them. Will be looking for other options for house slippers
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but gross.
customer_reviews.text: After owning these sandals for about 6 months, and having not touched them for the first three I can say I'm pretty disappointed. I purchased these as a shower shoe, and the neoprene or whatever the upper rubber is (while it is comfortable) continuously gets this stink that I can't get rid of, no matter what I do. Be it baking soda, vinegar, you name it...it just sticks! I don't even wear them that often. gross....I'm not a heavy guy, nor do my feet generate CRAZY amounts of sweat...I've tried drying in the sun as well...think it's just time for a new sandal...but a 3 month life span for 20 bucks? eghhh
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Adidas Slide Sandals offer great comfort
customer_reviews.text: I have worn pairs of this exact model of Adidas Slide Sandals for several years (and now it has been discontinued, unfortunately). The two primary features that I prefer about this model are 1) the "Cloudfoam" (soft) sole footbed that is void of any bumps; and, 2) the adjustable "Velcro" strap. The delivery on the sandals was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy Summer!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these! It was just what he needed for summer. I was a little concerned from reading the other reviews that I should have ordered the next size up, but these fit just fine. He likes that they feel like memory foam, and I like the fact that he can get them wet without it making them yucky. I also like the design of these because the Nike ones we usually get just look a little too feminine this year. So it was a great choice for us!
customer_reviews.author: cjczmommy

customer_reviews.title: Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: At first I didn't want to buy these because I thought it was too much to pay for what I thought were glorified flip flops. Since it was all my son really wanted last Christmas, I ordered them. He LOVES these mandles!! He wears them to school, to lounge at home, on the airplane (no laces to deal with, great with the TSA also), as slippers out of bed, on the boat, etc. Comfy and practical and go with any outfit, with or without socks.
customer_reviews.author: Martin ferrari

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes-but order a size up!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband for Easter...excuse me the Easter bunny got these for him! He normally wears an 8 1/2, sometimes an 8 in some brands, but after reading reviews we got him a 9. This fit him great-so definitely order a size up! He loves the squishy pad and adjustable strap-both things he wanted in a sandal. He doesn't like the sandals that have the "massagers," and this is nothing like those. You can't feel the little holes you see in the picture. Color is accurate (we bought the black with grey pad and green adidas). Would definitely buy again. These are also great for the wife to "borrow" when around the house :)
customer_reviews.author: sherry17

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for - best gym shower shoes for the money
customer_reviews.text: These are super comfortable; . The inside soles are very soft. I have a wide foot and 13(D) seems to be wide enough (I wear a 13(4E) in dress shoes). The soles on the bottom are pretty hard plastic; I wouldn't call them slip-proof but I didn't feel at all like I would slip when wearing them all around the bathroom at the gym. They do seem to retain a bit of water once wet, so give them a good shake or two before sticking them in the locker.
customer_reviews.author: DJ_Blaxx

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my husband ... who loves them. This was his 4th pair ... they are the only style he likes. He's purchased a similar pair of Adidas, but always comes back to these. As a matter of fact, he's "done looking" for any other. From about 2-3 pair ago, he always/only wants this brand and style. They fit your foot and if they don't, you adjust the top velcro strap so that they do. They've got great cushion as you walk ... and he even wears socks with them in the winter (that's how much he likes them)!
customer_reviews.author: Bentley's Folks

customer_reviews.title: Easy to adjust, I have edema and some days I need them larger and others I don’t, so it’s easy to adjust accordingly
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable the only thing that bothers me is the inside sole is made of some material not sure what, but it leaves the bottom of your feet black. I have washed these by hand a couple of times thinking it was just the newness of the sandal but still stains feet. Not a huge deal but you still need to scrub your feet when bathing if not it looks like you’ve been walking around barefoot
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne R

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced Slider
customer_reviews.text: the stitching on the side is FAKE. The whole overlap is glued onto the side of the shoe base. My previous Adidas sliders fell apart at this juncture. I thought by the picture that this pair would be better. NO, so I am returning them and I bought a pair at Walmart for 1⁄3 the price and they are designed much better. Go figure..
customer_reviews.author: Renee in Arizona

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I used these for a float/kayak trip over the summer. There were several times I thought I lost these when I tipped over from rapids on the river, but to my surprise these flip flops floated on the waters surface with ease. Also the durability seems to be there. After the abuse I put these thru by walking in the river's stronger current areas, I'm still using these all the time 5 months later. I use them for my everyday shoes and as my shower shoes at the local swimming pool.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: ... impressed by these slides compared to my previous Adidas Super Clouds. These I found very “flat” compared to ...
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed by these slides compared to my previous Adidas Super Clouds. These I found very “flat” compared to the Super Clouds which have a natural curve to them which seemed to bend easier making it more natural to walk. Disappointed Adidas changed a great thing.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan P.

customer_reviews.title: A great product. It lets you be 'barefooted' without hurting ...
customer_reviews.text: Fast service. A great product. It lets you be 'barefooted' without hurting or harming the soles of your feet. It's very nice have this type of foot ware without having a strap or a cord go between your toes. The slides fit well and stay on while you are walking. I'm sold on them!
customer_reviews.author: Robert R. Dale

customer_reviews.title: Wore these over the holiday vacation and they are so far great. Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Please be aware the size runs a little small. Order one size bigger for comfort. The cushion is medium soft and does not sink and lose it's thickness over time. The large strap will scratch the top of your foot but as long as you are not wearing these all day it really shouldn't be a problem. Wore these over the holiday vacation and they are so far great. Great purchase !!!!! But PLEASE ORDER ONE SIZE BIGGER !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: sunghwan choi

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit right nor stays on your foot
customer_reviews.text: These are the worst sandals I have bought. They just won't stay on your foot correctly. Besides the fact I take a 9.5 shoe and I got these at 10 and my foot barely fits, my foot always ends up canted to the side wearing these. No matter how tight I Velcro the slide, your foot continues to slide out and your foot will end up canted so half your heel is off the heel pad. I would return these if I still had the box.
customer_reviews.author: Chris P.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Had an old pair of Adidas sandals that looked the same, but the stitching came apart and so I bought these. Really glad I did! These new sandals are way more comfortable than the old style Adidas! The old ones had a bunch of bumps on the sole for grip which wound up hurting my feet if I walked around for more than 1 hour. These new ones are smooth and without bumps and so I could wear them all day. Great pair of sandals for quick trips outside, the pool, summertime, etc.
customer_reviews.author: choco

customer_reviews.title: Quality Flip Flip - perfect for pool, beach, and summer
customer_reviews.text: Son loves these and will be wearing them all summer long. Classic Adidas Sandals are waterproof and very comfortable. Bought these for a trip to Mexico and they quickly became his favorite sandals - he is actually wearing them to a Memorial Day Pool Party today. So far they have held up well and he will most likely outgrow them before he wears them out.
customer_reviews.author: Dave H.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Clouds
customer_reviews.text: These are like wearing clouds. I have neuropathy in my feet so the softness and cushion and bounce is exactly what I needed around the house on wood and ceramic tile floors. I wear a 91/2 woman's shoe, but ordered one full size up to a 9 and the are only a smidgen to large. They are a little long, but Since they adjust they feel just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Laguna Sunset

customer_reviews.title: He loves the Adjustable Velcro for multi use -  Happy Happy Happy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my boyfriend and he loves them. He likes the fact that he has the option with the Velcro to adjust the fit because he doesn't always wear them barefoot. I see he is adjusting them often and the Velcro is holding up quite well. Very happy with this purchase. No complaints so far 😊
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy K

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for around the house but wouldn't want to wear ...
customer_reviews.text: Average slides. Comfortable for around the house but wouldn't want to wear them all day. 2nd time I wore them, the Adidas logo on the heal started coming off immediately. Now 1 month later, it's almost completely gone while the other side looks almost brand new. I'm not sure if it was just poor quality on the logo installation or what.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable sandal for post run
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a women's 7.5-8 wide depending on the shoe. Ordered a men's 6 and they fit fine. I like that they can be adjusted slightly if needed. Bought these to wear post run with my compression socks for my half marathon training. They are comfortable for the few hours I wear them at a time which is mostly post workout or run and around the house (hardwood and carpeting). Will comment more later after I have worn them for more than a week.
customer_reviews.author: 4fahrenheit

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but I cannot for the life of me ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but I cannot for the life of me get the strap across the top adjusted in a way that doesn't make these things turn sideways enough while walking that my heel is going off the edge and rubbing a hotspot onto my foot. I feel stupid for being unable to properly use sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves them, so comfrtable and no breaking them in like the Adissage shoes!
customer_reviews.text: My husband normally wears the other Adidas Adissage slip on shoes and wore them for years before the strap eventually broke on one. He was saying he needed some more but he hates having to break them in (they have the weird bottoms that poke up). I decided to get him some new ones as part of his Father's Day gift and found these as the perfect alternative. He loves them and wears them constantly. He said these are much better than the Adissage because there is no having to break them in and they are even more comfortable. These are his new go to sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Tanisha Cook

customer_reviews.title: comfort wise is excellent, after being in closed shoes for work
customer_reviews.text: while my foot does not hang over either end, they are just long enough. my size runs 7- 7.5, I got 8. comfort wise is excellent, after being in closed shoes for work, 11 hours, including drive time, I enjoy the coolness provided. I may well get a second pair, in a larger size. Comfort, value, happy.
customer_reviews.author: fishman

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work well for me....
customer_reviews.text: The back of my foot tends to slide off the side of the sandal when I walk in it over time. It probably has a lot to do with the way I walk but I don't have this problem with all sandals. I think when I walk, my feet point out slightly (forming a V shape). As I'm walking, my heel rolls off the inside of the sandal because of this. As I said, it's likely just the way I walk, but I do not have this issue with all sandals so for those who might know what I'm talking about, these sandals are not for you.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Meeuwissen

customer_reviews.title: Bad design
customer_reviews.text: The Sandal fits weird on your foot if you get your size because the straps are to close to your toes. I would recommend getting one size or two sizes bigger then your actual size. The sandal is very comfortable and looks seemingly well made. I might return it though because it fits weird on my foot.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Feel comfortable as long as you don't walk in them
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought these were very comfortable, until I noticed if I walk more than a few feet in them the heel starts sliding out to the side so the heel of my foot is falling off inward. It's funny because I usually buy much cheaper sandals and I've never had an issue with them sliding off to the side. Something went wrong with the design on these.
customer_reviews.author: A Runnio

customer_reviews.title: Hot on My Feet
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace an old pair that got worn out. The only negative on these is that they retain heat. These make my feet hot. I intentionally bought them because i thought the indentations on the foot bed would disperse heat but they do not. My old pair that i loved had a memory foam foot bed and they did not trap heat. This pair has a rubbery foot bed and they feel hot on my feet after only a few minutes. If you don't have a problem with hot or sweaty feet then these will be fine but if your feet do get hot easily, you may want to try a pair with memory foam.
customer_reviews.author: Guy With Job

customer_reviews.title: Sideways slides
customer_reviews.text: They felt pretty good but after taking several steps they would go sideways and my heel would come off. I tried adjusting the strap but it still happened, had not had this problem before with other slides...
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great slides just order for womens size as opposed to mens.
customer_reviews.text: More womens sizing than mens. I did end up keeping these for my younger daughter and just ordered a larger size for my older daughter who I had originally ordered them for. They are good quality and comfortable. Just keep in mind order in womens size as opposed to mens.
customer_reviews.author: joy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: I use these as indoor shoes. They are comfortable. I've been wearing Adidas Superstar sandals for years. I recently needed to get a new pair but couldn't find any in my size so I got the Adissage SC Slide Sandal instead. The Superstars were a little more comfortable. But the foam midsole was less durable, did not do as well in wet conditions and was difficult to clean. The Adissage is a better all-around shoe. But, while I never had odor problems with the Superstars, I find that the Adissages can be a little more smelly.
customer_reviews.author: cat

customer_reviews.title: I bought these again
customer_reviews.text: I bought these again. The first pair lasted about 4 years. I used them all the time. I used them exclusively as house slippers. My feet are always warm so I was pleased that my feet did not sweat with them.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Kaufman

customer_reviews.title: Paint came off
customer_reviews.text: Paint came off after few uses no good not satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Elvis

customer_reviews.title: Unglued second use, garbage
customer_reviews.text: Delayed review because I forgot until today while buying Shoe Goo for repair... upon the second wearing one side completely unglued. We are loyal Adidas wearers as a household, but these slides are garbage and disappointing. I'd have had more enjoyment from lighting 30 dollars in cash on fire.
customer_reviews.author: Jollygreen

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: I've bought quite a few cheap pair of sandals to wear mostly around the house. My floors are concrete and tile, and cheap shoes hurt my feet and wear out quickly. These have enough padding that wearing them around my house is never an issue, even if I am on my feet all day.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: The quality was very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: These slides were purchased as a gift for my nephew. The quality was very nice for the price. The best feature is the adjustable Velcro flap for varying foot widths. Received the news that they are his favorites because of their comfort. I'm so glad I bought these for my nephew.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: Update: FIT AS EXPECTED IS A LIE, BUT NO OTHER CHOICE AVAILABLE --- After wearing for a few days I find the construction to be VERY FLIMSY. While adjustable, the straps do not hold my foot in place thus causing side-slip, dangerous! Sharp edges cause pain on heel. Would not recommend purchasing!!!
customer_reviews.author: rickoshay4u

customer_reviews.title: Fit good really comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for a beach vacation have had adidas sandals in the past and they were really durable. These fit great got one half size up from shoe size. Really comfortable soles. Only complaint is it feels like the Velcro might come undone but it doesn’t. Probably just needs to be broken in.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Soooo comfy!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these sandals and they are by far my favorite. I wore out the first pair since i wore them so much! I will wear these in the house, out to the store, anywhere! I love them! Will be purchasing another pair soon!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: I really love these! I read some of the reviews that ...
customer_reviews.text: I really love these! I read some of the reviews that said to size up but I'm glad I didn't and actually sized down one. I wear a size 9 and decided to order a size 8 because they seem to be on the wider side which they are. The size 8 fit me perfect and I do have a wider foot. I think these were mislabeled as Men's when they fit like women's adidas. So if your a man buying these then definitely size up 1 or 2 sizes. If you're a woman size down 1 or stick to your original size depending on the shape of your foot.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these a size down since I usually wear 7 in women so I bought the size 6 and it works great. They are a bit wide but I assume it's because they are men's. They are still very comfortable and now one of my favorites to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Pumpkin_Moon

customer_reviews.title: Not durable.
customer_reviews.text: Meh, they are comfortable, but they slide around on my feet a lot. Wore these maybe 300 times for showering, I'll try a different brand, I had UA in the past and one shoe got lost, so I decided to try these.
customer_reviews.author: MailNermal

customer_reviews.title: These are nice, but not that comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are nice, but not that comfortable. I forgot the name of the Adidas sandals I have been getting for years, but can't find them anymore. It stinks due to the fact that they where the most comfortable sandals ever. These are ok for small walks and around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Orion von Hubel

customer_reviews.title: Great but a little small
customer_reviews.text: I've owned many pairs of Adidas slides over the years and always wore the same size. A few weeks ago I bought a new pair and they were much bigger than my current paiur of the same size. I returned those and bought these and these are smaller than my current pair. They do (barely) fiut and are comfortable so I decided to skip the hassle of returning them. I'd just like people to be aware of the size issue.
customer_reviews.author: GoHeels

customer_reviews.title: This sandal is good, but for me
customer_reviews.text: This sandal is good, but for me, the Adidas adiLight is much better. This sandal has a flat surface and took awhile to break in so it would accommodate my foot. The adiLight has a surface that is shaped like the bottom of my foot, and has some arch support, so it felt comfortable right out of the box. I have sensitive feet and have had some episodes with plantar fasciitis. I've had to wear sneakers for years to get the arch support I needed. Slippers just don't have arch support. The adiLight can be slipped on in a few seconds, they are soft enough to be comfortable, but firm enough to give real support.
customer_reviews.author: Charles M. Flammer

customer_reviews.title: My son loved these flip flops because they fit him perfectly and ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loved these flip flops because they fit him perfectly and they stay on unlike other pairs he's had this season. All was good until the other day when he noticed the stench that was coming from them. To be honest, he's worn them to the beach and gotten them wet but they are flip flops so therefore they should dry quickly and be smell free you'd think. So if you are looking for a pair of flip flops for your kiddo buy these knowing they will smell terribly if they get wet. The saddest part is that the shoes still look great and have worn so well even with daily wearing. Total waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Cheek

customer_reviews.title: Feels good
customer_reviews.text: Solid slide shoe, they feel good on your toes. I wore them on a trip to the Islands and didn't mind wearing them each day. It's nice that you can adjust the tightness using the straps. My only beef with them is the white lettering got washed off within my first three days of wearing them. Not sure if it was the ocean water but that was disappointing. Otherwise good shoe, has a nice athletic feel that I could wear with basketball shorts etc.
customer_reviews.author: Dad 2019

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy and fits well, although it took a couple of days for them to stay on straight, if that makes sense. The lettering on the heels comes off over time. I was really confused for a while as to why I was finding seemingly-random white letters on my floor. It turns out that they were from "adidas" gradually falling off of these sandals. XD
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Bender

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband. He loves adidas. He doesn’t like the bumps in the other adidas. This is a smooth surface for your feet. Will buy again when I need to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: shelly humphrey

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly comfortable sandals
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has some chronic foot and ankle problems that make finding comfortable shoes difficult. She wears sneakers most of the time. These shoes feel very comfortable to her and give her a nice option for shoes to wear around the house.
customer_reviews.author: GLN

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: They are awesome and very comfortable! Came exact date it said it would arrive can't wait to show them off
customer_reviews.author: TheLynchFamily

customer_reviews.title: best adidas sandal
customer_reviews.text: I've tried every variety of Adidas slippers on the market & I've came to conclusion that nothing beats this pair. soo crazy comfy! better then anything else out. I had no problem with my pair which are still going strong many months later
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My husband and son wear the same shoe size. We only had one pair of these sandals. I am glad to see they are still made. This pair was a bit lighter in weight but are the same as the ones we purchased at Sport Chalet a few years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Cloudfoam is LEGIT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! SOOOOOO comfortable. I was bummed out on my latest trip bc I forgot my flip flops. I did bring these though and let me tell you....they were a very welcoming addition to my feet after a LONG day of convention work. Will def buy some more cloudfoam tech footwear.
customer_reviews.author: nicole t coovert

customer_reviews.title: Nice sandals!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my husband for Christmas and he obviously hasn't seen them, but I do have previous experience with them. They are very comfortable and you can adjust them if you have wide feet. I also like the cushion it has because it provides support and it's comfortable. I wouldn't recommend them for swimming since the cushion will get wet and that would just mess up your sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail T.

customer_reviews.title: Replacing an old pair
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace a worn out pair, wasn't sure I'd like these as much. But they are excellent. Comfortable, the size was right, and they don't feel like plastic crap. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Casual and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sandals for my husband. His shoe size is twelve and the size twelve sandals fit him well. They are good quality. The foot strap is adjustable and the foam sole is firm with a little give. Very comfortable. My husband is lucky that they are too big for me because I would take them for myself. I may have to buy a second smaller pair. I would recommend them to others.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great product, will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I read some of the comments on these shoes being too small. I had a pair before in size 12 so I ordered a new pair size 12. Fit perfectly. I wear a size 12, so there shouldnt be an issue with sizing. These are a change from the style with the little "nubs" that massage your feet. These are much more comfortable after a long run. Nice product and feel great!
customer_reviews.author: Matt G.

customer_reviews.title: how hard is it to size shoes. it is literally a standard you follow
customer_reviews.text: Adidas cant size any of their shoes correctly shouldnt all of your sandals fit basically the same. Why are 3 different shoes at size 10, 3 different sizes. You do realize that number correlates to a shoe size people pick from right. As in 10 should be 10 across your entire line not a different variation of size 10 based on your mood the day of design. Now ordering my 3rd pair hopefully they will fit this time.
customer_reviews.author: T_Fizzle

customer_reviews.title: Sent wrong color
customer_reviews.text: Was sent the black and white model, but decided it wasn't enough difference to worry about. The green and black would have been about 5% preferable, but basically just wanted a new pair. Had another pair that just got stinky. Like the slippers.
customer_reviews.author: Dr John

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable sandal. Seems to be able to take a ...
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable sandal. Seems to be able to take a beating when it comes to wet/dry use. So far no signs of wear and tear several months into its use. The Velcro strap is pretty strong and the sole is easy to clean if it gets dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro L.

customer_reviews.title: Flip-Flops that Almost Flopped
customer_reviews.text: Well, these Flip-Flops, Sandals, aren't quite as good as the Adidas I was trying to replace. The new pair are lighter, thinner, and more rigid. They're OK, and because they dry faster after cleaning (my older pair take hours to dry), I will keep them—largely as back-ups to my trusty older sandals that feel like pillows on my feet (they're labeled Super Star "soft comfort footbed" FitFoam sandals). And yes, it is best to order a size or two larger as these tend to run on the small side.
customer_reviews.author: Chopinzee

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, feels cheap
customer_reviews.text: These are okay. They fit great but they’re light and feel a little cheap. I’ve had some Adidas slides for years and they are still good, I just wanted a fresh replacement. I should have bought the voloomix slides. I’ll wear them until they break then I’ll buy the voloomix or something
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like these since there is no foam for it to ...
customer_reviews.text: Got these to replace some foam version. The other ones (4 pairs) all started to smell big time. I like these since there is no foam for it to suck up the foot odor. My feet sweat so was looking for ones that could help not get so stinky so fast.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: These are great for wearing around the house of if you're sitting ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great for wearing around the house of if you're sitting at the pool. Very comfortable and nice looking. I would not recommend them for walking any sort of distance, they do not stay on my feet very well (your results may differ).
customer_reviews.author: rob williams

customer_reviews.title: Super cushiony, stylish, must have.
customer_reviews.text: I wear 8.5/9 in women. I got this in 7. Its slightly too small for me, but its ok. These are my house slippers. It has cushoons, looks pretty and i hope last long. I had to retire my old adidas sandals. Had it wrapped i duct tape to keep it together loool
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for a nice pair of slides for a while now and I’m so happy I found these. It’s the classic adidas sandal look but instead of that bumpy bottom it’s a nice cloud foam. The more I wear them the more they break in and the more I love them. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DannyB

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable width, better than thong flip flops.
customer_reviews.text: These are great for the beach or the pool, akin to slippers. I would not do a lot of walking in these, say for theme parks. They're better than thong flip flops because they can be adjusted to the width of your foot. I have wide feet and they're great for me. The foam footing is really spongy yet firm; if I were to describe the feeling, it would be like a really mushy bicycle seat.
customer_reviews.author: TheDude

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and water proof as described
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and water proof as described. Looks fine and is designed well. Size has to be carefully selected from the link provided for the product description web page. Wish the slippers had better arch support, but for temporary use and the modest price, I cannot complain.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: this product's quality really disappointed me.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately even though Adidas is solid firm, this product's quality really disappointed me... At first it was uncomfortable but it was somewhat ok, but after few weeks the black paint from sandals moved to my feet... This paint is extremely hard to wash off from feet... So they are now garbage for me as I can't use them... Again I am really disappointed with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Giorgi

customer_reviews.title: no complaints
customer_reviews.text: I've only had these a few days so I can't speak about their durability. I can say that they fit as expected and are comfortable. The cloudfoam is the perfect compromise between memory foam and the standard board like sole of many sandals. These came in at the perfect time too, as temps are warm enough now to where them.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: He wore these for hours very comfortably on a variety of terrain including sidewalks
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my boyfriend and gave them to him on a vacation we had to San Diego. He wore these for hours very comfortably on a variety of terrain including sidewalks, the beach, in the ocean, and along rugged rocks. Never once did he complain of any foot soreness. Adidas sandals are always excellent and I would definitely consider ordering from this seller again, as these were shipped very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Kettler

customer_reviews.title: Great adidas slides
customer_reviews.text: I was having problems replacing my old slides as most of the new ones had some sort of little wanna be massage nodules on the sole. I looked around a lot and ordered a few pair, but most were too narrow. These slides have a very comfortable and cushy sole and the velcro closing was great for adjusting size.
customer_reviews.author: LMedina

customer_reviews.title: Love them. They're easy to slip on
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of these sandals for 10 years. They finally gave out and I just purchased a new pair. Love them. They're easy to slip on, comfortable, and last forever. Definitely worth paying a little more than you normally would for a casual sandal!
customer_reviews.author: CT. Guy

customer_reviews.title: Just Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I got these to replace other flips I'd finally worn out after 10 years. These are so superior that I wish I'd done it earlier. They fit perfectly, are comfortable to wear, slide on easily... they're perfect in every way. The only notable blemish, which is so silly, is that the lettering on the heel wears off. Ha! You won't regret buying these... they're truly great.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Lawton

customer_reviews.title: Love love love loveee
customer_reviews.text: Love love love loveee. So incredibly comfortable. I bought them a size down as a woman because i didn't like the women's options for this style (that one has pins that stick into your feet, ouch). I'll discount one point because without socks, i keep tripping over my feet and they slide off.
customer_reviews.author: Honest

product_meta.title: adidas Men's Adissage SC Slide Sandal
product_meta.description:
Après-game relaxation includes slipping into these slides. Plush SUPERCLOUD is comfortable and quick to dry. An adidas brandmark and 3-Stripes add iconic styling, while an adjustable single strap dials in the fit.

Sensitive feet? The new adidas adissage UF+ is the ultimate in comfort. Super-soft UltraFOAM+ offers incredibly plush cushioning in a shower-friendly footbed.

adidas is a name that stands for excellence in all sectors of sport around the globe. The vision of company founder Adolf Dassler has become a reality, and his corporate philosophy has been the guiding principle for successor generations. The idea was as simple as it was brilliant: to provide every athlete with the best possible equipment. It all began in 1920, when Adi Dassler made his first shoes using the few materials available after the First World War. Today, the adidas product range extends from shoes, apparel, and accessories for basketball, soccer, fitness and training to adventure, trail and golf.

See more
feature_bullets: Synthetic bandage upper with hook-and-loop adjustable closure for custom fit
Extra-soft, water-resistant SUPERCLOUD EVA footbed for quick-dry comfort
Super-soft UltraFOAM+ quick-dry footbed for comfort and odor control
Injected EVA outsole for lightweight comfort
